ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Most people don't understand how severe my condition is.
Notes: 0= Never; 1= Rarely; 2= Sometimes; 3= Often; 4= All of the time; 9999= no data

ElementDescription: My life will never be the same.
Notes: 0= Never; 1= Rarely; 2= Sometimes; 3= Often; 4= All of the time; 9999= no data

ElementDescription: I am suffering because of someone else's negligence.
Notes: 0= Never; 1= Rarely; 2= Sometimes; 3= Often; 4= All of the time; 9999= no data

ElementDescription: No one should have to live this way.
Notes: 0= Never; 1= Rarely; 2= Sometimes; 3= Often; 4= All of the time; 9999= no data

ElementDescription: I just want to have my life back.
Notes: 0= Never; 1= Rarely; 2= Sometimes; 3= Often; 4= All of the time; 9999= no data

ElementDescription: I feel that this has affected me in a permanent way.
Notes: 0= Never; 1= Rarely; 2= Sometimes; 3= Often; 4= All of the time; 9999= no data

ElementDescription: It all seems so unfair.
Notes: 0= Never; 1= Rarely; 2= Sometimes; 3= Often; 4= All of the time; 9999= no data

ElementDescription: I worry that my condition is not being taken seriously.
Notes: 0= Never; 1= Rarely; 2= Sometimes; 3= Often; 4= All of the time; 9999= no data

ElementDescription: Nothing will ever make up for all that I have gone through.
Notes: 0= Never; 1= Rarely; 2= Sometimes; 3= Often; 4= All of the time; 9999= no data

ElementDescription: I feel as if I have been robbed of something very precious.
Notes: 0= Never; 1= Rarely; 2= Sometimes; 3= Often; 4= All of the time; 9999= no data

ElementDescription: I am troubled by fears that I may never achieve my dreams.
Notes: 0= Never; 1= Rarely; 2= Sometimes; 3= Often; 4= All of the time; 9999= no data

ElementDescription: I can't believe this has happened to me.
Notes: 0= Never; 1= Rarely; 2= Sometimes; 3= Often; 4= All of the time; 9999= no data

ElementDescription: IEQ total score
Blame/Unfairness score
Severity/Irreparability score
IEQ Percentile
